pkgmetadata.longdescription: [![MIT License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-green.svg)](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit/)Django Political-Administrative Division of ChileDivisión Política-Administrativa de Chile para Django=================================================``Regiones - Provincias - Comunas``=================================================This fork was created to update the package to work with the latest versions of Django 3.2+ (4.1 included) and Python, as the [original developer](https://github.com/jupitercl/django-dpa-chile) appears to be inactive.Information obtained from the api of Modernization and Digital Government Unithttps://apis.digital.gob.cl/dpaPypi====https://pypi.org/project/django3-dpa-chile/Installation------------Install **django3-dpa-chile** using **pip** pip install django3-dpa-chileAdd **d3_dpa_chile** to **INSTALLED_APPS**settings.py----------- # ... INSTALLED_APPS =[ ... 'd3_dpa_chile', ] # ...Populate-------- python manage.py migrate d3_dpa_chile python manage.py populate_dpa_chileUse--- from d3_dpa_chile.models import Region, Provincia, Comuna
